title: Advanced passenger train
brief_description: Gives an insight into British Rail’s Experimental Advanced Passenger Train powered by gas turbines and with a host of revolutionary ideas such as a tilting system to stabilise the train at speed on sharp curves and hydro-kinetic braking.
